questionnaire.title: Srouer questionnaire
questionnaire.introduction: Hello, I'm of V.Lance Tarrance & Associates, a national public opinion research firm located in Houston. Today, we are talking to people in Nebraska about cigarette smoking and I would like to ask you some questions.

questions.question: Are you 18 years of age or older?
Do you yourself usually smoke at least one cigarette a day?
Is there anyone in your household who is 18 years or older who usually smokes at least one cigarette a day?

answers.yes: ASK TO SPEAK TO THAT PERSON, REPEAT INTRO AND GO TO B.

statements.statement: Fewer people seem to be smoking cigarettes nowadays?
statements.follow_up: IF ANSWERED ASK: And do you feel strongly about that?
